import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem hoelder_inequality_finite {n : ℕ} {p q : ℝ} (hp_gt_one : 1 < p) (hpq_conj : 1 / p + 1 / q = 1)
    (μ ν : Fin n → ℝ) (hμ_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ μ i) (hν_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ ν i) :
    ∑ i, μ i * ν i ≤ (∑ i, (μ i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) * (∑ i, (ν i) ^ q) ^ (1 / q) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• p > 1 [tc_2]
• q = p / (p-1) [tc_3]
Therefore, we conclude:
• 1/p + 1/q = 1 [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have hq_eq : q = p / (p - 1) := by
  field_simp [ne_of_gt hp_gt_one,
    (by rintro rfl; simp [inv_zero, hp_gt_one.ne.symm] at hpq_conj)] at hpq_conj ⊢
  rw [mul_sub_one, sub_eq_iff_eq_add, mul_comm, hpq_conj]

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem hoelder_inequality_finite {n : ℕ} {p q : ℝ} (hp_gt_one : 1 < p) (hpq_conj : 1 / p + 1 / q = 1)
    (μ ν : Fin n → ℝ) (hμ_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ μ i) (hν_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ ν i) :
    ∑ i, μ i * ν i ≤ (∑ i, (μ i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) * (∑ i, (ν i) ^ q) ^ (1 / q) := by
 have hq_eq : q = p / (p - 1) := by
```lean4
  rw [← Real.isConjExponent_iff_eq_div_sub_one_of_one_lt hp_gt_one]
  constructor
```

```lean4
 have hq_eq : q = p / (p - 1) := by
  have hp_ne_zero : p ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp_gt_one]
  have hq_gt_one : 1 < q := Real.one_lt_of_inv_add_inv_eq_one hpq_conj hp_gt_one
  have hq_ne_zero : q ≠ 0 := by linarith
  have hp_minus_one_ne_zero : p - 1 ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp_gt_one]
  -- We show that `1/p + 1/q = 1` is equivalent to `p + q = p * q` by clearing denominators.
  have h_equiv : p + q = p * q := by
    field_simp [hpq_conj, hp_ne_zero, hq_ne_zero]
  -- The goal `q = p / (p - 1)` is equivalent to `q * (p - 1) = p`.
  rw [eq_div_iff_mul_eq hp_minus_one_ne_zero]
  -- `p + q = p * q` and `q * (p - 1) = p` are equivalent linear equations.
  linarith [h_equiv]
```

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem hoelder_inequality_finite {n : ℕ} {p q : ℝ} (hp_gt_one : 1 < p) (hpq_conj : 1 / p + 1 / q = 1)
    (μ ν : Fin n → ℝ) (hμ_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ μ i) (hν_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ ν i) :
    ∑ i, μ i * ν i ≤ (∑ i, (μ i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) * (∑ i, (ν i) ^ q) ^ (1 / q) := by
 have hq_eq : q = p / (p - 1) := by
  have hp_ne_zero : p ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp_gt_one]
  have hq_gt_one : 1 < q := Real.one_lt_of_inv_add_inv_eq_one hpq_conj hp_gt_one
  have hq_ne_zero : q ≠ 0 := by linarith
  have hp_minus_one_ne_zero : p - 1 ≠ 0 := by linarith [hp_gt_one]
  -- We show that `1/p + 1/q = 1` is equivalent to `p + q = p * q` by clearing denominators.
  have h_equiv : p + q = p * q := by
    field_simp [hpq_conj, hp_ne_zero, hq_ne_zero]
  -- The goal `q = p / (p - 1)` is equivalent to `q * (p - 1) = p`.
  rw [eq_div_iff_mul_eq hp_minus_one_ne_zero]
  -- `p + q = p * q` and `q * (p - 1) = p` are equivalent linear equations.
  linarith [h_equiv]
  sorry

theorem hoelder_inequality_finite {n : ℕ} {p q : ℝ} (hp_gt_one : 1 < p) (hpq_conj : 1 / p + 1 / q = 1)

    ∑ i, μ i * ν i ≤ (∑ i, (μ i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) * (∑ i, (ν i) ^ q) ^ (1 / q) := by

  sorry
